entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Grand Étang
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:48 PM AST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Grand Étang 5:00 PM AST Thursday 19 January 2023
Temperature: 1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 0.2°C
Wind: WNW 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending after midnight then cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near zero except near minus 3 over the Highlands.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 to 10 cm except 15 cm over the Highlands. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near zero except near minus 3 over the Highlands. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.summary: Flurries. Windy. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 19 January 2023
